Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_01.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: "As the battle comes to an end, the lecture hall's outer wall gives way, and Yuka crashes through into the adjacent classroom."}
{3: 'Where flower petals once lay scattered, now only a dim, decrepit space remains.'}
{3: 'Dust blankets everything, the room dilapidated and devoid of life.'}
{3: 'This place once served as an after-school study room for students...'}
{3: "Decades have passed, leaving behind only the school supplies that couldn't be carried away during the evacuation."}
{3: 'Having exhausted all the power Cradle had granted her, Yuka collapses into a pool of her own blood.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yata...'}
{3: 'The daybreak sun pours freely into the space, yet comes to an inexplicable halt before reaching Yuka.'}
{3: 'She looks around at her surroundings with bleary eyes, as if just waking from a dream.'}
{3: 'After a long moment, her gaze slowly refocuses on Yata as understanding dawns.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Thank goodness... you managed to escape.'}
{3: 'A smile of relief spreads across her face.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1074.jpg'}
{3: 'Yata feels a lump in her throat and unconsciously closes her eyes.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'The tide of memories rushes backward, threatening to sweep her away.'}
{3: 'A desperate scream echoes from afar, fragments of broken words pouring into her ears.'}
{3: '"Run, Yata!"'}
{3: 'She snaps back to reality just in time, grasping at the final lifeline in this world of devastation.'}
{1: '"Thank goodness... you managed to escape."', 3: '65', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{3: '"Thank goodness... you managed to escape."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_01.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'Yata opens her eyes, a storm of conflicting emotions churning in her chest.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "What's all this talk about escaping? Can't believe you're still hung up on that after all these years."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Not just back then, it remains true even now.'}
{3: 'The girl before her gazes on quietly, the obstinance and madness in her eyes fading away along with the power of the Red Tide.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'What do you mean... even now?'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I'm glad that you made it out of my consciousness projection this time."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1074.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "Yata's body trembles as realization dawns upon her."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You didn't just wake up now. You remember everything you've done...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yes, Yata. I remember. I remember every single detail.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I remember deploying my consciousness projection, and I remember inviting you to join the Red Tide.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yuka responds slowly, an indescribable sorrow wavering in her crimson eyes.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'No... you could have lied to me, said that the Red Tide suppressed your M.I.N.D., that Cradle was controlling you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I would've believed you. I'd much rather believe that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'The Red Tide did suppress my M.I.N.D... Even so, the consciousness projection was my own choice.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Didn't it only bring pain? Both to your M.I.N.D. and to everyone under its control.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "It wasn't like this when the Punishing first broke out.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yuka slightly bows her head and lets out a soft sigh.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Even in my comatose state, I could hear them, the Punishing's victims, screaming, raging, and weeping by my ears...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'So I did everything in my power to create a beautiful dreamland, so they could pass without having to suffer.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "It's Dr. Saotome's dream to connect human consciousness together to bring people happiness, and I was trying to do just that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "See? Consciousness projection isn't all that bad, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'You know what, Yata?', 4: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'That winter when the Punishing broke out, Hydrangea Island was blanketed by heavy snow.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'The solitary buildings, the withered flower beds... everything lies buried beneath a blanket of white snow.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'In this vast world, I stood alone... not knowing where to go, nor why I should go anywhere.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I walked through that heavy snow for what felt like an eternity... Days? Months? Years? Time lost all meaning as I wandered on alone.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: '...Until the day I was awakened.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory699.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yata... You should understand it by now. Saving humanity, connecting everyone's consciousness, bringing happiness to all... Such noble ideals.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I was the only one who ever sought salvation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Projecting consciousness to erase people's pain... it was nothing but a substitute for my own desires.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The girl lifts her head, her black hair cascading down her shoulders and slipping through her fingers.'}
{3: "Her smile is feeble and sorrowful, causing Yata to turn away, unable to bear the look on Yuka's face."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "...But using the Red Tide's power for consciousness projection can never eliminate pain. Rather—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "It infects those who receive the projection, doesn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'To accept the Red Tide means submitting to its will.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'It continuously amplifies my obsession and uses it to expand its own power.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Curious about why I accepted the Red Tide?', 4: '2'}
{1: "No, that's not what I want to ask.", 3: '60'}
{3: "No, that's not what I want to ask."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Because I was so lonely there, amidst the heavy snow.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Of course.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'It was just that simple of a wish—to live on, and to not be alone anymore.', 4: '2'}
{1: "I've always known!", 3: '60'}
{3: "I've always known!"}
{3: "As vital fluid gushes out of Yuka's wounds, the countdown of her life quietly begins."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Why... does it need to come at the cost of your life? Is there really no other way? Are there no miracles?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata thought she had mentally prepared herself already, but she cannot help but seek a definitive answer all the same.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "I mean... I don't own this life anyway, and it's time I gave it back.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The cruel truth shatters her last hope, paining Yata so much she can barely breathe.'}
{3: 'Yet the girl lying in the pool of blood simply offers Yata a quiet smile.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Yata, don't look so sad.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'I consider myself lucky to have seen you again.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Her throat tightens, leaving her unable to speak.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: "Why do we have to part ways again when we've only just found each other?", 3: '60'}
{3: "Why do we have to part ways again when we've only just found each other?"}
{1: "Why am I getting this ending when I've given it everything I've got?", 3: '60'}
{3: "Why am I getting this ending when I've given it everything I've got?"}
{1: 'Why are you being kind to someone like me...', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Why are you being kind to someone like me...'}
{1: 'Mock me with spite, cry in despair, scream in anguish—anything, please, just say something to me, even if only for a moment.', 3: '62'}
{3: 'Mock me with spite, cry in despair, scream in anguish—anything, please, just say something to me, even if only for a moment.'}
{1: "Because I'm the one who failed to save you, the one who killed you with my own hands.", 3: '60'}
{3: "Because I'm the one who failed to save you, the one who killed you with my own hands."}
{1: 'The one who has always been weak and powerless...', 3: '60'}
{3: 'The one who has always been weak and powerless...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1074.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Only now, seeing you here, do I finally understand that consciousness projection isn't the way for people to truly connect.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'No matter how many minds I connect with, I still feel so lonely.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Only when the Red Tide's power fades away can I be free, and only then can we truly reunite.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "That requires giving it everything you've got, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'So... stop blaming yourself for this.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yata lowers her head, her body trembling uncontrollably.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Even so, you still have to go...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yes... My life should have ended many years ago.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'What I have now is nothing but borrowed time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "If I have one regret, it's that we never got to say a proper goodbye.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yata gazes intently at the young girl kneeling beside the lecture hall.'}
{3: 'Goodbye, goodbye... Yata opens her mouth to speak, only to bite her lip tightly shut.'}
{3: 'She had said goodbye to Yuka countless times before, yet today, the words refuse to leave her lips.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Do you remember how I once wove a dream for everyone, each according to their wish...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'In these dreams, some were promoted to officers, some became heroes, and a few shed their uniforms to live ordinary lives...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'While you remained at Misono High.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: '...Is there something wrong with dreaming about Misono High?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "One's best dream shouldn't lie in the past... but in the future.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yuka gazes around with lingering affection, and Yata follows her line of sight.'}
{3: 'The aged classroom, the freshly sprouting flowers and grass—everything remains as it was, yet everything rushes toward tomorrow...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'Yata, my time is running out...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "You should go for what lies ahead... while I'll stay here.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The girl's voice, soft and delicate, fades away with her life, drifting into the distance."}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: 'So cold...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As if trying to grasp something, she desperately reaches out both hands into the void.'}
{2: 'Yuka Saotome', 3: "Here, it's snowing again.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Yuka's hands fall limply as her body collapses."}
{3: 'The distance between life and death always seems so vast.'}
{3: "Even a hand's breadth away becomes an unreachable distance."}
{3: 'Just as Yata rushes forward to catch Yuka, she notices someone else has already held her up.'}
{3: "Confused about Reika's presence, Yata is pulled back to her senses by a transmission from Valeria."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "Yata, if you're still alive, withdraw immediately. The Red Tide is coming.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "The Red Tide? It still hasn't stopped?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "No, it hasn't stopped, even though Shiva and Discord's M.I.N.D.s are normal again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Strange... I thought Yuka's powers were gone?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "The Lady of the Red Tide hasn't reclaimed the power she had left Yuka...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Reika kneels to support Yuka's shoulders and let her rest against herself."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Then you have even more reason to not stay here. The Red Tide is coming.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yata, this will be my final experiment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Dr. Saotome, I really don't want to lose my temper with you... but Yuka is slipping away!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Do you know why Yuka can create such beautiful dreams, yet remains in constant agony?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Because Yuka tries to bring happiness to people by projecting her consciousness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Is that the only thing you can say now when you were the one that put her through her suffering?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika looks at Yata with intensity, a flicker of struggle crossing her eyes.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Because those who weave dreams cannot dream themselves.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '"I was the only one who ever sought salvation."', 3: '60'}
{3: '"I was the only one who ever sought salvation."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1074.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'That is Prometheus.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'An experiment in consciousness projection, allowing humans to communicate mind to mind, giving happiness to everyone...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "And yet its creator is the only one who can never find happiness... Ironic, isn't it?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yata narrows her eyes, studying the elegantly dressed woman from head to toe.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Yuka has been in slumber for decades. You're not her, how could you possibly understand what she feels?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reika gently extends her hand, catching the rays of sunlight that fall upon them.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'You once asked me why I went to such lengths to transform myself into a Construct.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Here is why... because the consciousness projection experiment has to continue.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Yata stares at Reika as the anger in her heart slowly fades away. She already has an inkling of the answer, there's no need to ask any more questions."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'After Yuka fell into her slumber, you turned yourself into a test subject for consciousness projection.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "That's how you came to understand the pain that consciousness projection inflicted upon Yuka.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: "No... what I experienced wasn't even a fraction of what Yuka had gone through.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Reika gazes at the young girl leaning against her, who now lies with eyes tightly shut, quietly awaiting her life to fade away.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'Yuka created beautiful dreams for so many people, but she never had any of her own.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'This will be the final experiment—a one-on-one consciousness projection, led by me.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yata takes a deep breath as the shrieking of the Red Tide reaches her ears.'}
{3: 'Yata finds herself unable to say what she wanted to say.'}
{2: 'Reika Saotome', 3: 'There are no heroes in real life, but I will shoot down that eagle for her.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Unfazed by the trembling earth beneath, Reika speaks with serene determination.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: '...Please do so.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Yata takes one last long look at Yuka before turning away and rushing toward Valeria's coordinates."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'As she leaves the dilapidated classroom, a distant voice echoes once more within her M.I.N.D.'}
{3: 'Goodbye... Yata.'}
{3: 'To which she responds softly.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Goodbye... Yuka.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without looking back, Yata sprints forward into the distance.'}
